title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3049/79 of 21 December 1979 adjusting the common marketing standards for certain fresh or chilled fish
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3049/79  of 21 December 1979  adjusting the common marketing standards for certain fresh or chilled fish
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B to Regulation (EEC) No 103/76, in respect of redfish and anchovies, is amended as follows: >PIC FILE= "T0011643">

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1980.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1979.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 20, 28.1.1976, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 347, 12.12.1978, p. 1. (3)OJ No L 20, 28.1.1976, p. 29.
